sentences.en: And if it is a despot you would dethrone.
sentences.cn: 如果是暴君,你会罢黜他.

sentences.en: Charlotte always arranges everything in our house and rules us like a despot.
sentences.cn: 在我们家里,件件事总是由夏洛特去安排,她象个专制君主那样统治着我们.

sentences.en: Deeply enraged, Guan Yu killed the despot and fled the town.
sentences.cn: 关羽一怒之下,把虎员外杀了, 逃亡他乡.

sentences.en: Despot sector of the mortgage loans will have money!
sentences.cn: 霸王部门按揭贷款房贷将要花多少冤枉钱!

sentences.en: Despotism: Rule by or as if by a despot; absolute power or authority.
sentences.cn: 专制: 如同或被专制者统治; 绝对权力或权威.

sentences.en: Does the girl student lose hair being able to use despot to against taking off shampoo?
sentences.cn: 女生脱发可以用霸王防脱洗发水 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fishermen organized spontaneously to struggle against the local despot that had monopolized the fishing market.
sentences.cn: 原则上,我不反对你在会上提出的意见.

sentences.en: He is every inch a local despot.
sentences.cn: 他彻头彻尾是个土皇帝.

sentences.en: He was a despot with a heart of granite.
sentences.cn: 他是个铁石心肠的暴君.

sentences.en: He was a local despot, who committed all kinds of crimes.
sentences.cn: 他独霸一方, 为非作歹.

sentences.en: She rules her family like a real despot.
That emperor was a cruel despot.
sentences.cn: 那个皇帝是个残酷的专制君主.

sentences.en: The despot claimed to be the chosen instrument of divine providence.
sentences.cn: 专制者声称自己是上天选定的统治工具.

sentences.en: The despot will not be coming to the cloning lab today.
sentences.cn: 暴君今天不去克隆实验室.

sentences.en: The local despot trenched on the temple's property.
sentences.cn: 当地恶霸侵占了寺庙的庙产.

trans.tran_en: someone, especially a ruler, who uses power in a cruel and unfair way
